ev3dev.hardware

Class EV3DevDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • ev3dev.hardware.Device
      • ev3dev.hardware.EV3DevSysfs
        • ev3dev.hardware.EV3DevDevice
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseRegulatedMotor, BaseSensor, BasicMotor

    public class EV3DevDevice
extends EV3DevSysfs
    Base class to interact with EV3Dev sysfs

    • Constructor Detail

      • EV3DevDevice

        public EV3DevDevice(java.lang.String type,
                    java.lang.String portName)
             throws DeviceException
        Every device connected in a EV3 Brick with EV3Dev appears in /sys/class in a determinated category. It is necessary to indicate the type and port.
        Parameters:
        type - A valid type. Example: tacho-motor, lego-sensor, etc...
        portName - The port where is connected the sensor or the actuator.
        Throws:
        DeviceException
